nodes.text: Clan Itera was a Mandalorian clan in existence following the time of the Mandalorian Wars. When Jicoln Cadera rebelled against the Sith-favoring reign of Mandalore the Vindicated, Clan Itera was one of several clans that rallied to Cadera's side. Cadera and his clan's movement was defeated, Clan Itera was accepted back by Mandalore, and continued to be a respected part of the Mandalorian culture.
Clan Itera was first introduced to Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a MMORPG created by BioWare and released December 20, 2011.
